column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl . gh ḥ. tawshīḥun li’abī bikrun bn zahr

column2: qum wāintabih wāunẓur ilá dhāk al-‘idhār
waman ma‘ah bahj al-sanā ghunj al-shifār
qul lilḥabīb al-ladhī yurḍīh safk damī
column3: damī ḥalālun lah fī al-ḥill wal-ḥaram

column2: in kān safk damī aqṣá murādikum
column3: famā ghalat naẓratun minkum bisafk damī

column1: al-ṣan‘ah . ṭubi‘ al-ḥijāz al-kabīr . tawshīḥ muqtaḍab
